entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Make session related libraries trimmable #58787
  • Make authentication libraries trimmable #58786
    .NET 10 Planning
  • The Tags Property in OutputCache attribute is not working when using custom policies. #58785
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudUpdateProduct #58784
  • Stop embedding JS files in Endpoints and Server assemblies #58783
    10.0-preview1
  • Microsoft.Extensions.ApiDescription.Server - improve file name consistency with versioning #58782
  • Correlation failure #58780

Closed

  • Developers can safely trim ASP.NET apps to reduce their deployment payloads #27384
    .NET 10 Planning
  • `FromKeyedServices` Causes Generated Code to Fail to Compile #58633
  • Perf regression: fortunes, fortunes_dapper, fortunes_ef #58767
  • Perf improvement: json_middleware #58775
  • Correlation/Nonce cookies accummulated causing Nginx Request Header Or Cookie Too Large #58731
  • Can I add `TempData` to Blazor? #58779
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Perf regression: json, json_spring #58679
  • dotnet watch run 自动退出，提示Exited with error code -1073740940 #58601
  • Blazor: Accessing HttpContext in a Client Project #58593
  • Blazor WebAssembly - HTML select tag with @onchange event does not hit breakpoint when clicking to select values from dropdown using the cursor, but works with up/down key from keyboard #58615

PullRequests

Created

  • Update Selenium packages #58791
    area-infrastructure
  • Fixed the hot-keys for Blazor WebApp template options #58790
    area-blazor
  • Unquarantine Http1Connection_RequestEndsWithIncompleteReadAsync #58789
    area-networking
  • Unquarantine Http1Connection_ServerAbort_HasErrorType #58788
    area-networking
  • Update .NET SDK to 10.0.100-alpha.1.24553.6 #58776
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:

Merged

  • Fix flaky ServerShutsDownGracefullyWhenMaxRequestBufferSizeExceeded #58735
    area-networking, 10.0-preview1
  • Fully qualify type names for services when resolving in RequestDelegateGenerator #58640
    community-contribution, feature-rdg, area-minimal, 10.0-preview1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `df1544b` to `1204d63` #58746
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • [release/6.0] Test on CentOS 7, not RedHat 7 #58561
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, pending-ci-rerun, 6.0.x
  • no dispatchGlobalEventToAllElements when no renderer attached #58667
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x
  • Use Linux machine with Chrome #58473
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/8.0] Update Messagepack dependency #58676
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.x
  • Convert ref and runtime packs to use the SharedFramework SDK and Arcade's installer tooling #58612
    blocked, area-infrastructure
  • Add package for consuming Blazor framework assets #58721
    area-blazor
  • Remove GET_RequestReturnsLargeData_GracefulShutdownDuringRequest_RequestGracefullyCompletes #58738
    area-networking
  • Add `AuthorizationPolicyBuilder.RequireClaim` overload that take a `Func<Claim, bool>` #56346
    community-contribution, area-security
